title: Quick Survey On How You Use Quick Cast/Non-Quick Cast

replies.body: I have never used quick-cast. This is part of the reason why I've never even tried to learn champs like Yasuo or Lee sin. At this point, I'm too entrenched in my ways to try to get used to it. I also play on locked screen. If I were teaching League to a new player, I would recommend for them to start playing the game with everything quick-casted.
It's not to late to learn unlocked and quick cast either normals, custom, or bots can be of great value

The way I got into quick cast was playing yasuo.

Set his E on quickcast and it's very easy to learn how.
Most people use quick cast all I believe
I see several youtubers with many subs who dont
The ones I've watched use quick-cast, and most the people I know use quick-cast. Although, it took me forever to switch to quick-cast so I can see that.

I don't use quick-casting.

Lulu support is 90% picking and choosing who gets buffs and who doesn't, and if I were to spam shit without much thinking botlane's gonna be done for.
